name: GOLDBERG's Escape Room
description:
As the legendary Goldberg seeks to leave his greatest machines to a worthy successor, do you think you got what it takes to be the next Goldberg? The hardest escape room is waiting for you on the other end. Good luck and Godspeed!

Developers

CANSANA,  JOSE LORENZO

JAMALUL,  GABRIEL RASHEED

PE,  SEAN MICHAEL

TENG,  LANCE RICCO
